RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo President @dilmabr addresses the inauguration ceremony of the Jeep Automotive Polo: http://t.co/jndPu79vnV
The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of the president during the inauguration of the Polo Automotivo Jeep, in Pernambuco.
Inaugurating this industrial unit of the Fiat Chrysler Group gives me immense satisfaction and pride.
This factory is the result of a partnership: on the one hand, one of the largest automobile companies in the world, on the other, Brazil and Pernambuco.
I highlight the role of 2 Pernambucans: former governor Eduardo Campos and former President Lula, committed to the development of the state.
A bold step like this, to install in Goiana the modern industrial plant of the Group, expresses confidence in the direction of the Brazilian economy.
The choice of Goiana stems from a clear decision of the fed government to help the people of Pernambuco to have here an industrial automotive pole ...
... of immense impact for the generation of employment and growth of the State.
This support took the form of a significant volume of financing - 2/3 of the amount invested came from credit granted by BNDES.
It will also occur in the form of tax incentives such as IPI credit for each new vehicle model produced at this plant by 2020.
We are unconditional partners in the development of Pernambuco.
We made political choices and added efforts to make this industrial plant feasible in Goiana.
I am not ignoring the current deceleration, and we are working to improve the basis for continued production and demand growth.
The automotive industry in Brazil is + globalized, with companies coming from a much larger number of countries (...)
(...) whose results are increasingly important for their matrices.
We want to be, besides a production platform, one of the main bases of innovation of the world auto industry.
We will continue working to create a business environment that is increasingly favorable to the Brazilian industry.
The federal government maintains its commitments to Pernambuco.
Yesterday, a prior license was granted for the stretch between São Lourenço da Mata and Suape do Arco Metropolitano, now we can bid.
On May 5, Goiana will complete 175 years as a city.
Today it is an early gift, the Jeep Automotive Polo, which extends the certainty of much progress in the coming decades.
Congratulations to the people of Goiana and Pernambuco for this step towards industrial development.
Congratulations to the Fiat Chrysler Group for the initiative and great success to the Jeep Automotive Polo.

The first of May has been a date to evaluate, advance and celebrate achievements.
Among thousands of direct d conquered few are as important as the minimum wage, in a country that has income inequality like ours.
In March of 2015, we sent to the Congress the project of valorization of the minimum wage for 2015-2019.
It is fundamental that we can guarantee by law, until 2019, the increase in the purchasing power of the minimum wage.
In the last 4 years of my mandate, through the valorization policy, we have had a minimum wage increase above inflation of 14.88%.
In 2013, by demand of the plants, we sent the reduction of the income tax on the PLR.
We also reduced the federal taxes on food and basic food products to zero, which is fundamental for the workers.
Regarding the Outsourcing PL, it is urgent to regulate the outsourced work in Brazil to have protection and guarantee of living wage.
It is also important for entrepreneurs to have clear legislation.
However, regulation needs to maintain the differentiation between end activities and middle activities.
It is necessary to ensure that the worker is guaranteed the rights earned in the wage negotiations.
The commitment of my gov. is that we have the rights and the guarantees of the workers are maintained and we will do it with a lot of dialogue.
Nothing is better than the frank and transparent dialogue between the social segments that are benefited by measures.
I sign the decree that creates a Debate Forum on Employment, Labor, Income and Pension Policies.
It will be composed of workers' centers, representations of retirees and pensioners, entrepreneurs and government.
